insights.populationGrowth: Stable at 0.1% annually. Mining development provides some employment but climate challenges drive emigration.
insights.educationLevel: Moderate education with 75% literacy. Limited educational infrastructure in remote areas.
insights.employmentPattern: Livestock herding 50%, mining 25%, agriculture 12%, services 8%, government 5%. Mining sector growing.
insights.housingPattern: Traditional gers 50%, permanent houses 35%, mining accommodations 15%.

insights.temperature: Desert-steppe climate with extreme temperatures, winters (-30°C), summers (35°C). Gobi Desert influence.
insights.precipitation: Very low precipitation 120mm annually. Arid desert conditions with high water stress.
insights.seasonality: Cold dry winter, hot dry summer with minimal precipitation. Extreme aridity year-round.
insights.extremeEvents: Severe droughts, dust storms, extreme temperature swings, rare but destructive flash floods.

recentDisasters.impact: Complete ecosystem failure, mass livestock death

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Very Low - Extreme remoteness, minimal infrastructure
